books.title: Programming in C
books.author: Dennis Ritchie
books.summary: A foundational book covering variables, loops, arrays, functions, pointers, and structures in C.

books.title: Data Structures Using C++
books.author: Mark Allen Weiss
books.summary: Comprehensive guide to stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and sorting algorithms.

books.title: Database Management Systems
books.author: Raghu Ramakrishnan
books.summary: Covers ER models, normalization, SQL, transactions, and indexing.

books.title: Operating System Concepts
books.author: Abraham Silberschatz
books.summary: Detailed explanation of memory management, scheduling, and file systems.

books.title: Web Design Principles
books.author: Jon Duckett
books.summary: Learn modern UI/UX and responsive web design techniques.

books.title: Discrete Mathematics
books.author: Kenneth Rosen
books.summary: Covers logic, sets, combinatorics, graph theory and mathematical reasoning.
